short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert the ChatGPT content into a Word or a PDF format in a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly convert your ChatGPT responses into Word or PDF documents with this simple and intuitive Chrome extension. 

With just one click, you can transform valuable insights from your ChatGPT conversations into a downloadable Word or PDF file, making it easy to save, share, and reference important information. 

This extension helps you convert the ChatGPT response into Word without loosing formatting. 

It also helps in converting the ChatGPT response into PDF without loosing formatting. 

This also supports equations, images and tables. 

Whether you're using ChatGPT for research, content creation, or brainstorming, this extension streamlines your workflow by allowing quick document conversion without leaving the page.
